com.mobius.vdrapi.callbacks
Interface IHoldDownloadStatus

public interface IHoldDownloadStatus

A class implements IHoldDownloadStatus to provide the number of pages being downloaded and the total number of pages need to be downloaded.

Method Summary
 int getCompletedPage()
          Returns the number of pages that has been downloaded to the output buffer so far.
 int getTotalPage()
          Returns the total number of pages need to be downloaded
 void setCompletedPage(int page)
          Sets the number of pages that has been downloaded to the output buffer so far.
 void setTotalPage(int page)
          Sets the total number of pages need to be downloaded
